titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to transmit to the Congress a report on maritime policies of the Department of Transportation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2567-2568)

bill.summary: 3/23/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to report to the Congress on the Department of Transportation's maritime policies for the next five years.
